title: The Hollow Star
description: What becomes of a wolf born under the new moon?Nothing has stirred the heart of Inara, eldest daughter of the moon and most powerful star in the heavens, for more than an age. Then the song of an outcast draws her into the clutches of an ancient darkness… and it demands far more of her than a single wish.Embark on an exhilarating journey alongside a fallen star and an outcast wolf in this original mythic fairytale novelette. Follow Inara and Ari through the dark heart of the forest, where they’ll wrestle with the shadows lurking amongst the trees, as well as the ones in their own hearts.
author: Penny Kearney
